column1: Indicator Name: Overweight or Obese Adults
Indicator Description: Overweight or Obese Adults
Notes: *Estimate is based on small numbers so should be interpreted with caution

column3: How Calculated:Estimated number of adults classified as overweight or obese; based on the Body Mass Index (BMI) calculated from self-reported weight and height rounded to the nearest 1000. A BMI between 25 and 29.9 is classified as overweight and a BMI of 30 or greater is classified as obese.

How Calculated:Estimated number of adults classified as overweight or obese; based on the Body Mass Index (BMI) calculated from self-reported weight and height expressed as a percent. A BMI between 25 and 29.9 is classified as overweight and a BMI of 30 or greater is classified as obese.

column1: NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene
More information can be found at: http://nyc.gov/health/tracking
